body.name: SonoxJunan Wireless 2.4G WiFi Home Security 1080P Video doorbell Camera, Two-Way Audio, IP65waterproof, Motion Detection and Human Detection, IR Night Vision, Family Sharing, with Two Indoor Chime
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 17 mins
features: Easy Install & Two Wireless Chimes - Wireless video doorbell camera setup and installation eliminates the need for wires and drilling, and it only takes 10 minutes to install the video doorbell in the desired location in your house and start using it. (Supports only 2.4G wifi connection)Wireless video doorbell camera Kit includes two wireless chime.
FHD 1080P & IR Night Vision - HD video doorbell camera with 1080P HD picture quality and IR night vision feature provides a clear picture day or night.

Family Sharing & Two-way Audio - Video doorbell camera supports family sharing, you can share the device with your family or friends. Two-way audio function, you can use the video doorbell to talk to the guests at the door by voice.
PIR Human Detection - Video doorbell camera has a built-in PIR people detection feature that allows you to be notified immediately when the visual doorbell camera detects an approaching person.

Security Cloud Storage - Video doorbell camera features AES-128 encrypted secure cloud storage (Separate subscription required), so you can view and share your videos anywhere, anytime with secure cloud storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive WI-FI Doorbell is great for home security!
reviews.reviewText: The Sonox Junan Wi-Fi doorbell is a game changer! Easy to install.Looks quality and reliable. The HD camera captures sharp images day or night and a wide angle lens ensures no detail goes unnoticed.The two way audio via the app allows to communicate with visitors effortlessly. Setup was a breeze, and the app integration is seamless. The battery is rechargeable and long lasting. It is a fantastic addition to my home security, offering good price, convenience and peace of mind!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aligns with my expectations
reviews.reviewText: After searching for doorbell cameras for a while, I decided to stick with this one as the price is just right, and it has all the features I was looking for. The installation was pretty easy, and it’s narrow enough to fit in the desired location. Now I’m able to see when packages and mails are delivered, which is very convenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a waste of time and money I replaced one with another and either one worked

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it has all the features that most of the expensive ones have out there. this is worth the money.. works perfect.. !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must required doorbell.
reviews.reviewText: In today's fast pace world, video doorbell is a necessity now. After searching for few days , finally I took this doorbell, because it has external chimes also with phone app, which is really useful, because I usually miss the phone notifications. Installation is pretty simple. Picture and sound quality are quite good with respect to bucks I spent on this one. Also It's looks great. Overall a nice buy for me..Will update in few weeks about the performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chimes are great
reviews.reviewText: Great product, I love that it has 2 indoor plug in chimes that are pretty loud. I also own a Blink video doorbell and my biggest problem with it was that it didn't ring. Only a notification on my phone that I missed half the time. Now I won't miss anyone at my door anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smooth transaction & fast shipping! Item exactly as described! A+ Seller! Works great, exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Home Security.
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding product, The best Wireless Video Doorbell Camera has revolutionized how I protect my home. The crystal-clear video footage, allows me to see every detail of what's happening outside my door. The motion detection and human detection features are incredibly accurate, minimizing false alarms and ensuring I'm only alerted when necessary.The two-way audio function is very clear, allowing me to communicate with visitors from anywhere using my smartphone. I can easily interact with delivery people or unexpected guests, giving me peace of mind knowing I'm always connected to my home. The IR night vision is impressive, providing clear footage even in complete darkness. & The family sharing feature and inclusion of two indoor chimes make it easy for everyone in my household to stay informed about activity at the door.The very good part is the easy installation and mapping of the two chimes, which happened in just 10 minutes.
